name: Crow
text: Here it is. One of the sources of the corruption.

name: Crow
text: I will pluck the roots and make my way ba-

name: Crow
text: Wait. Why do I feel . . . strangely . . . drawn to it.

name: Crow
text: I know this place. This is where it all began . . .

name: Crow
text: What is my connection to this dark magic?

name: Crow
text: Oh dear witch, do you really have my best intentions in mind . . .
